subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Patriots Coach Bill Belichick called the hit from Broncos wide receiver Wes Welker that sidelined cornerback Aqib Talib one of the worst he had ever seen.
snippet: Patriots Coach Bill Belichick called the hit from Broncos wide receiver Wes Welker that sidelined cornerback Aqib Talib one of the worst he had ever seen.
